basics.name: Staff Accountant
basics.label: Accountant
basics.summary: Flexible Accountant who adapts seamlessly to constantly evolving accounting processes and technologies.
highlights: Prior experience using MS Excel, JD Edwards, QuickBooks, AX, and RFMS on an expert level
